item.title: Bestie Breakup – Run For Love
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bestie Breakup – Run for Love is a fun running game. When it’s a green complete love heart card on your head, it will lead to progress in your relationship. On the contrary, if it is a red broken heart card, there will be cracks in your relationship. You will have many goals, whichever is […]
item.content:encoded:
Bestie Breakup – Run for Love is a fun running game. When it’s a green complete love heart card on your head, it will lead to progress in your relationship. On the contrary, if it is a red broken heart card, there will be cracks in your relationship. You will have many goals, whichever is right to go for.
PC & MobileSlide to aim at the target, release to launch the ball
